ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.vdisk

Interface IVirtualBlock

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDataBlock, IFreeBlock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataBlock, FreeBlock, VirtualBlock

    public interface IVirtualBlock
    Represents a block on the virtual disk. This interface provides the common contract that all kinds of blocks have to provide to the outside world.
    See Also:
    IDataBlock, IFreeBlock

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getBlockPosition()
      Returns the position (address) of the block inside the virtual disk.
      long getDiskSize()
      Returns the size in bytes of the block on the disk.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlockPosition

        long getBlockPosition()
        Returns the position (address) of the block inside the virtual disk. Address 0 would be the first byte inside the virtual disk.
        Returns:
        the address of the block

      • getDiskSize

        long getDiskSize()
        Returns the size in bytes of the block on the disk.
        Returns:
        the size in bytes of the whole block on the virtual disk.
